content: i have a fluffle of angora rabbits in the maximum fuzz state they look like a loaf of fur with ears i wanted to create a very easy beginner crochet pattern and the simplistic dumpling loaf shape of a hairy rabbit is perfect yarn is fuzzed after to create the angora rabbit halo **difficulty** beginner/ easy magic loop single_crochet and seaming **size** varies with gauge sample 4 wide 6 long and 5 tall including ears / 10cm wide 15cm long and 13cm tall **yarn** super bulky 100% wool cascade lana grande 1 ball knitpicks/wecrochet fluff of the andes 1 1 ball 45-65 yards / 41-59 meters 100% wool is preferred for fuzzing other yarns may work but swatch first **crochet hook** 5 5mm / i crochet hook or size to obtain a tight gauge favorites clover 2 tulip 3 furls 4 wecrochet 5 **notions** 12mm black doll eyes stitch markers tapestry needle polyfil stuffing hook & loop/ velcro and scrap black yarn/ felting supplies/ felt & fabric glue free pattern | contains affiliate links 1 https //shrsl com/4axwo 2 https //www amazon com/clover-1048-green-amour-crochet/dp/b008j140u8/ &_encoding=utf8&tag=oolowl-20&linkcode=ur2&linkid=9d4e4c3383bfe66b3ea2ebfe6d17fd65&camp=1789&creative=9325 3 https //www amazon com/etimo-crochet-hook-size-5-50mm/dp/b08c6798pw/ &_encoding=utf8&tag=oolowl-20&linkcode=ur2&linkid=453b47bb815a1cbd8b193b47a1f36620&camp=1789&creative=9325 4 https //shrsl com/4axwu 5 https //shrsl com/4axx8
